Summary: Blackish/Grayish Triangular object/ looked like there was some kind of cloaking enabled- Kind of like the movie Predator
divs: sighting details i was sitting on my front porch talking on the phone with a friend from back east. it was late in the evening; quarter past 11 or so when i looked up in the sky and as soon as i did, i saw a damn ufo. i knew exactly what it was when i saw it. it was blackish\greyish with...some kind of cloaking devic. it resembled the camo of the alien in the movie predator. it was moving very fast and in a straight line. i lost sight of the ufo in a couple of seconds. i was traveling westbound in a straight line. i know it was relatively close to the ground because because of its size. i did not hear anything though or see any lights of any kind. when i saw it, i knew exavtly what it was and a sence of pure honor\luckieness came over me. i never doubted it for a second that it was not a ufo.it was unmistakeable! i told the person on the phone what i saw and she thought i was nuts. it sounds nuts, i know. i hope to see something like that again in my lifetime, but probably won't. it was such a blessing to see. thank you
trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Sacramento
There were no other sightings in Sacramento on or around October 6th 2009
